turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Deli, I had a rough morning with early conference calls on the east coast. Can you get an order going for me at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure boss! Any particular store you want your order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where's my next meeting?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You need to head into SoJo for your meeting...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect there's a spot at West 90th after Redwood. Put the order in for there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Firing up the app now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm headed out now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your usual Earl Grey Latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Need more than that today. Any recommendations?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I like the White Mocha...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me the Quad Grande Caramel Macchiato, extra hot, extra caramel, non-fat, no-foam upside down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Upside down?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Don't actually turn it upside down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They'll know what that means?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They're Starbucks, they know what it all means.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No foam. Just put the order as I've told you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay boss. Order's going in. For West 90th East of Redwood?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready for you to pick up soon. I ordered you a morning bun to refuel, too. Receipt should hit your inbox in three, two...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're a rockstar. Have I told you that today?
